title: I noticed an article in the star news stating that NC schools will not add more days for students during the 2011-2012 school year. Why has the New Hanover School calendar not been amended to show this change? The calendar still shows extra days for students.
text:
Although the state gave all school districts a waiver of the
requirement
(http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110729/WIRE/110729554), New
Hannover opted not to take all five waiver days. In addition, the
district added a day after Hurricane Irene.
